name: abcNURI
description: A liquid version of the tokenized veNURI from Nuri Exchange on Scroll. abcNURI enables holders to receive yield based on Abacus's voting power on Nuri and provides means to access more yield either through the Fee Distributor or autocompounder. abcNURI holders do not have to vote or otherwise participate in the underlying dex and still get access to rewards from Nuri Exchange at a beneficial rate.
